name: Demon Star II: Interstellar Overdrive
overview: ROGUE-LIKE SPACE CRAWLER MEET YOUR CARGO QUOTA - EVADE OR DESTROY THREATS You are a highly skilled contract privateer in interstellar trade. You are employed to traverse multiple star systems picking up cargo capsules to be safely delivered back to your trade guild's starbase. You must fulfill your quota of cargo, supplemented by eliminating threats and foes such as star pirates and killjoy extremists who either want to steal your wares or otherwise engage in nefarious activities such as the slave trade that is rife across the galaxies. Navigate your ship equipped with advanced interstellar overdrive warp engines by using your star map / radar display. Make use of your laser cannons against enemy craft threats and fleets in a struggle against overwhelming odds. GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS: Hover over cargo capsules until your ship transports them to your ship's cargo hold. After complete an icon representing cargo contents will be displayed and your score/cargo quantity will be incremented.
